Reviews.Title: Great - Top layer of "TEXTURED" Paint wearing of the body fast
Reviews.Author: Perry
Reviews.Content: Its the new style paint that was intended to give a texture to the camera body so you can supposedly  hold it better I guess was the intent. .  Well that top layer of textured paint started wearing off very soon after I began to use  it.  I do carry it in my pants pocket.  That's why I bought it.  To supplement my Canon G10, and  Canon DSLR, but to be able to put it in my pockets.  But the layer of paint below the textured paint seems top be sticking to the body - so far.

Reviews.Title: Very good bundle
Reviews.Author: Hisham
Reviews.Content: the bundle was very good, but only one thing that should be notice, the clearing liquid should be placed alone, it is leaked in the closed pack which was include screen protector, and small tripod. The screen protector is useless after that.
